name: Verify Fix for DEF-005: Set Course with [C]
description: Verifies that pressing [C] initiates the course setting action.
testObjective: Confirm that the defect is fixed and course setting works as expected.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Complete exploration in Region 0b and transition to Region 1.
Access the Filesystem terminal and run SAFETY.a.
Use the camera system to locate and scan the scannable planet.
Run report.kp4 and finalize the Cerebellum report.
Observe the map update and automatic refocus onto Ladagocia.
Interact with Ladagocia to display the prompt '[X] SET COURSE [C]'.
Press [C] to attempt to set course.
steps.expected: Pressing [C] should initiate the course-setting action.
